item.title: SP4 proteomics article online today in Analytical Chemistry
item.description:
This one really is Harvey’s story through-and-through—great job getting it over the line this summer!

Wouldn’t have been possible with a strong supporting cast: co-authors Kranthi and David from the Babraham Institute Mass Spectrometry Core Facility, and our always-positive collaborators George Biggs, Jo Kirkpatrick, and Holger Kramer, who were willing to test-drive this protocol from an early stage.

A couple of great write-ups also available to whet your appetites: one from Honor Pollard in the BI Communications Team, and another from Anjali Sarkar for GenEngNews. Thanks both!

More reading:

  • BI News: New technique recovers more hard-to-get proteins
  • GenEngNews: Proteomics Sample Prep Upgrade Captures More Proteins for Less
  • Harvey wins Best Poster Award at BSPR 2022
